fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Ho Quoc Huy 
Date of birth (mm/dd/yyyy): 
06/03/1989  
Place of birth: 
Hai Phong 
Gender:  Male 
         Address: 
154/20 Vo Thi Sau Street, 
Ward 8,District 3, HCMC 
Objective 
♦ To be a good staff. 
♦ Try to learn as much as possible and doing my best in order to 
accomplish task given. 
♦ To have good opportunities to get promotion in my job. 
♦ Develop my skills with development of company, and I want to prove 
myself. 
Profile 
♦ 7 years experience in Java developer. 
♦ 3 years experience in Team leader. 
♦ Fluent English communication skills. 
♦ Worked as full-stack developer and experiences in Java/J2EE, 
Wicket, Jquery, Spring Framework, Hibernate, Web Service, 
responsive UI with Bootstrap 
♦ Experience in large systems (product information, payment and 
insurance system). 
♦ Experience in Scum software development model 
♦ Experience in security process, audit data. 
♦ High sense of responsibility. 
♦ Programming languages, and software applications with cutting-edge 
knowledge of technological changes. 
♦ Having ability to work well under pressure and accomplish assigned 
work. 
♦ Highly analytical team player with great communication skills, 
aptitude for quickly scrutinizing environments to identify and 
prioritize needs/risks and develop solutions. 
♦ Friendly with people, independent working. 
♦ Enjoys talking to and working with customers. 
Education 
♦ Diploma in Information System Management, FPT-Aptech, HCM 
♦ Higher Diploma in Software Engineering, FPT-Aptech, HCM 
♦ Bachelor of Computer Science of HCM University of Industry 
Technical 
Skills 
♦ 
Technologies (Apache wicket, Struts, Velocity, Spring, 
Hibernate, iBatis, Gradle, Maven, Jquery, Css, Kendo library) . 
♦ 
Database administrator (MySQL, Oracle, MS-SQL Server ). 
♦ 
Version control (GIT, SVN) 
♦ 
Web service (AXIS , AXIS2,JAX-RS :SOAP,RESTFUL) 
♦ 
Other technical: SMPP (SMS system), Jasper report (open 
source JAVA report), Vert.x, AWS, Web 
♦ 
Working on OS ( macOS, Linux , Window). 
♦ 
Can design document(Detail design, Flow chart, Test case). 
Professional 
Experience 
➢ 
Projects in Laudert GmbH (Now) 
● Product information management : Media port 3 
          (Use Apache wicket, Spring, Hibernate, Gradle, Spring boot, 
Web socket) 
                (Coder, Tester (Unit test, automation test)) 
➢ 
Projects in VietPace (9/2016) 
● Internal website for Construction company   
          (Use Struts 2, Spring, AWS, Hibernate, Kendo) 
                (Project Leader, Coder) 
● Analyst finance website : BPS  
          (Use Struts 2, Spring , Hibernate, FB Api, Google Api, Oracle) 
                (Project Leader, Coder) 
➢ 
Projects in Mservice (9/2014 ) 
● Web Payment : Momo.vn (E-wallet) 
          (Use Grails, Jquery, Ajax, Css, Oracle) 
                (Coder, Tester) 
● OMO Summer : Draw online event (sms) 
            (Use Jetty server, Oracle, SOAP) 
                  (Project leader, Coder , Tester) 
● ClearMen + Clear +Shell: Draw offline event (sms) 
            (Use Jetty server, Oracle, SOAP) 
                  (Project leader, Coder , Tester) 
● SMSCGateway : SMS system(E-wallet)  
            (Use SMPP, Oracle, SOAP) (Maintainer) 
● GapitGateway : new SMS system  
            (Use SMPP, Oracle, SOAP) 
                  (Project leader, Coder , Tester, Maintainer) 
● MOMO-Connector : Integrate Payment into mobile App 
               +Visa, Fshare, Bkav, Prodential, Pingsky, Nhabe-water 
            (Use Vert.x, Oracle, SOAP, RESTFUL) 
                  (Coder , Tester, Maintainer) 
Projects in NTT Data VietNam (8/2011->9/2013)  
● Nitco-Cosmos : Material auditing website(Nissan motor company) 
          (Use Struts 1, Spring , iBatis framework ) (Coder) 
● SkyPerfect : Satellite website (Billing system) 
          (Use Struts 1, Spring, iBatis) (Coder)  
● Koga : Insurance website (Labor project) 
            (Use Struts 2, Sping 2.3 , iBatis, Jquery, Css, MySQL) 
                  (System analyst, Coder , Tester, Maintainer) 
Projects in Ho Chi Minh University Of Industry 
● Graduation thesis: Recruitment website (.NET)        
            (Use : ASP.NET , SQL Server 2005)      
                  (Teamleader, Coder, database analyst… ) 
● Many projects for subject by winform ( c# ) 
Projects in FPT Aptech 
● Website selling fashionable clothes (ASP.NET)                   
          (Teamleader, Coder, database analyst…)(sem1) 
● Application for Managing the advertising company (java)  
          (Teamleader, Coder, Database analyst)(sem2) 
● Website selling flowers (ASP.Net )  
          (Teamleader, Coder, database analyst)(sem3) 
● Website selling auto parts (JSP) 
          (Coder)(sem4) 
➢ 
➢ 
➢ 
Hobbies 
♦ Updating 
new 
information 
about 
technology, 
sport, 
and 
entertainment. 
♦ Watching movies. 
♦ Traveling. 
♦ Listening music. 
I declare that the statements made by me in this CV are true and complete, and 
understand that a false statement, dishonest answer or non-disclosure may render me 
liable for dismissal by the company. 
I will abide by the company’s rules & regulations as declared to me or contained in the 
employee handbook, notice board, memorandum or manual. 
Applicant’s signature 
Ho Quoc Huy
